Text:
This uploader is an absolute idiot. 1280 x 548 is NOT 720p pixel ratio. And how in the world is this almost 3 gigabytes? That just makes absolutely no sense that a 1 and a half hour in a LESS THAN 720p resolution comes out to be 3 gigabytes in space.
DON'T DOWNLOAD

@Banango

You are THE idiot! This is still considered 720p (1280x720), just cropped to make it ultra wide! Maybe you're still a VHS user.. You know nothing about HD..
